mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , blame_no , blame_bid , blame_type , mm_nickname , target_nickname , blame_date , blame_content , blame_ip FROM ( SELECT * FROM Blame ORDER BY blame_no DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , blame_no , blame_bid , blame_type , mm_nickname , target_nickname , blame_date , blame_content , blame_ip FROM ( SELECT * FROM Blame WHERE blame_type like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY blame_bid DESC )) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , blame_no , blame_bid , blame_type , mm_nickname , target_nickname , blame_date , blame_content , blame_ip FROM ( SELECT * FROM Blame WHERE target_nickname like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY blame_bid DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , blame_no , blame_bid , blame_type , mm_nickname , target_nickname , blame_date , blame_content , blame_ip FROM ( SELECT * FROM Blame WHERE blame_date BETWEEN #{ begin } AND #{ end } ORDER BY blame_no DESC )) WHERE RNUM >= #{ startRow } AND RNUM <= #{ endRow }
select count(*) from Blame where blame_type like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
select count(*) from Blame where target_nickname like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
